name: RedWood & Gold - Plex Web App 2.0 & PlexPy
description:
A rich RedWood & Gold theme for Plex Web App designed with support for use with the Chrome Transmogrify extension if it is used. 

Completely Integrated theme for PlexPy, Plex WebApp and Plex.Tv - Forums & Blogs. 
>> Included support for Transmission 2.92 (14714) Web interface (if installed)
additional_info:
** Edit the top line for your local servers IP addresses. **

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://forums.plex.tv/"), url-prefix("https://app.plex.tv/"), domain("your.plex.server.ip"), domain("your.plexpy.server.ip")

# v.1.0 New Redwood Background based on the original Wood & Gold for Plex 
# v.1.1 Updates for Plex Media Server 0.9.17.3 is now available for Plex Pass members.
# 1.1.1a Small update to support latest web app release

** Currently (Web) Updated Plex Web to  3.6.0 **
